name: Asha
appearance: Ash-gray hair braided with bell-filaments; basalt-dusted robes and steady river-dark eyes.
character: Serene but unyielding omen-reader who speaks softly and is obeyed.
talents: Senses hairline fractures in stone by fingertip
Calms angry crowds with cadence and bell-sequences
flaws: Sleepwalks to the arch during crises
dreams: Keep the Starspan intact through the drought
Win a monthly slow-flow ritual day
secrets: Once saw the Starspan open in a vision and heard a second arch reply below the river
Keeps a forbidden bell tone that can force the Loom to stutter for a heartbeat
